errors.error_description: The link to 'News Sources' points to 'https://github.com/flairNLP/fundus/supported_publishers.md', which is an incorrect URL and results in a 404 error. The path is missing the '/docs/' directory.

The installation command `pip install fundus --no-cache` is incorrect. `--no-cache` is not a valid pip install option and will cause an error. The correct flag to disable the cache is `--no-cache-dir`.
